details:
adjective
- free from clumsiness
= synonyms: clean
- without water
= example: without water
= synonyms: straight
- free from what is tawdry or unbecoming
= example: free from what is tawdry or unbecoming
= synonyms: refined, tasteful
- very good
= synonyms: hot
- clean or organized
= example: clean or organized
= synonyms: orderly
- showing care in execution
= example: showing care in execution
